bo-cisco-980.name: Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980
bo-cisco-980.description: The new over-ear wireless headset that's designed for life and perfected for business.

carouselItems.alt: A side view of the Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980 headset. The Bang & Olufsen and Cisco logos are visible on the outside of the ear cup.
The Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980 headset. The Bang & Olufsen and Cisco logos are visible on the outside of the ear cup.
A side view of the Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980 headset. The Bang & Olufsen and Cisco logos are visible on the outside of the ear cup.
A front view of the Bang & Olufsen Cisco 980 headset.

features.longPhrase: Surround yourself in sound for maximum focus during meetings or while listening to music.
Wireless, portable design with up to 24-hours of battery life.
Premium materials and an off-center pressure point eliminates irritation.
Eliminate distractions with active noise cancellation and background noise removal.

specs.text: Connectivity: Bluetooth® 5.1, USB, and 3.5 mm
High end audio experience with advanced codecs
On-ear buttons for easy call, music, and noise cancellation controls
Companion mobile app for a customized, signature experience
Enterprise-grade security and manageability

cisco-headset-730.name: Cisco Headset 730
cisco-headset-730.description: The award-winning, on-ear wireless headset with advanced noise cancellation that’s designed for work and play.

carouselItems.alt: A side view of a Cisco Headset 730 in platinum.
A view of the left side of a Cisco Headset 730 in platinum, showing on-ear button controls.
The Cisco Headset 730 in platinum, shown in its charging stand
A front view of a Cisco Headset 730 in platinum.

cisco-headset-730.tagline: Go anywhere and leave the distractions behind.

features.longPhrase: Portable and wireless with a boomless design so you can take it with you wherever you go.
Up to 20 hours of talk time so you can take your meetings with you wherever you go.
Switch between meetings and calls to your favorite focus-work playlist and simultaneously pair with up to two devices.
Active noise cancellation with background noise reduction helps keep your calls crystal clear in any environment.

specs.text: Connectivity: Bluetooth® 5.0, USB-A, and 3.5 mm (audio only)
Voice activated AI: Access Google Assistant or Siri
On-ear buttons for easy call and music controls
Companion mobile app for configuration and customization
Enterprise-grade security and manageability

cisco-ip-dect.name: Cisco IP DECT
cisco-ip-dect.description: The scalable, reliable, and cost-effective phone solution for healthcare workers.

carouselItems.alt: Three Cisco IP DECT phones on the left with three IP DECT base stations on the right.

features.longPhrase: Long-lasting battery provides 17 hours of talk time and 200 hours of standby time.
Speed dialing and emergency calling with one button dedicated to ensure staff’s safety.
Texting features allow mobile workers to share information quickly and conferencing lets them easily connect with the entire team.
Ruggedized handset options designed to sustain daily usage.

specs.text: Bluetooth® 5.1
Premium telephony enabled by Wideband audio
Multicell and single-cell base stations and repeaters for flexible communications designed to accommodate company growth
High resolution display and backlit keys in the 6825 model
Secure, closed system with encryption and device authentication will be unimpacted by neighboring Wi-Fi access points

cisco-mic-array.name: Cisco Microphone Array
cisco-mic-array.description: A premium table microphone array designed for spatial audio pickup, enabling an immersive boardroom experience.
cisco-mic-array.tagline: Be heard in your high-stakes meetings.

features.longPhrase: Capture participant voices from different directions and deliver multiple streams of high-fidelity audio.
Augment your boardroom table with an elegant, compact microphone array that includes hidden cabling, magnetic attachment option, and multiple cable outlets.
Elegantly recessed or placed on the table, the microphones become a natural part of your boardroom environment.
An intuitive mute button and discrete LED indicator allows you to easily control and see mute status.

specs.text: Product compatibility: Room Panorama Series
Connector: Ethernet RJ45
Frequency range: 100 Hz to 16 kHz, +/- 6 dB (on axis)
Signal-to-noise ratio: Minimum 70 dB
Control: Using Webex Room Navigator touch controller
Deployment: Ethernet, supporting audio over IP setup, allowing for enhanced flexibility

meraki-z3c.name: Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway
meraki-z3c.description: Provide security, convenience, and optimized access to your home office.

carouselItems.alt: The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.
The Meraki Z3C Teleworker Gateway device.

features.longPhrase: Get an office-like experience at home with Wi-Fi that’s always connected.
Enable plug-and-play office telephony in your home office from PoE-enabled ports.
Deliver insights into how apps are performing for remote workers with powerful end-to-end analytics.

specs.text: Recommended clients: Up to 5 devices
Stateful Firewall Throughput: 100 Mbps
Maximum VPN Throughput: 50 Mbps
WAN Interfaces: 1 x GbE RJ45; 1 x USB (cellular failover)
LAN Interfaces: 4 x GbE
PoE: 1 x PoE enabled port (802.3af, 15.5W)

mr46.name: MR46
mr46.description: Wi-Fi 6 access points that deliver the performance and efficiency you need for indoor environments with a dedicated security radio.
mr46.tagline: Powerful Wi-Fi for your home office.

features.longPhrase: Leverage dual-concurrent radios with MU-MIMO support.
Prioritize productivity apps and even restrict recreational traffic with Layer 7 traffic shaping.
Self-configuring, plug-and-play deployment with network-wide visibility and control.
Set up a real-time wireless intrusion detection and prevention system (WIDS/WIPS) for enhanced security.

specs.text: Four radios: 2.4 GHz, 5 Ghz, dual-band embedded WIDS/WIPS, and Bluetooth® Low Energy
4-stream UL/DL MU-MIMO 802.11ax
One 2.5 Gbps multigigabit Ethernet port
PoE: 802.3at

mr56.name: MR56 AP
mr56.description: Wi-Fi 6 with multigigabit ethernet. Ultra-high performance and efficiency for dense indoor environments with a dedicated security radio.

carouselItems.alt: The MR56 in white. The Cisco logo is visible in the lower right corner.

features.longPhrase: Alert and manage digital operations in real time.
Make workplaces work better.
Transform venues into intelligent spaces.

specs.text: 4x4:4 (2.4GHz) and 8x8:8 (5GHz)MU-MIMO 802.11ax.
5.9* Gbps dual-radio aggregate frame rate.
24x7 real-time WIDS/WIPS and spectrum analytics via dedicated third radio.
Integrated Bluetooth Low Energy Beacon.
Integrated scanning radio.
Enhanced transmit power and receive sensitivity.

ms120-8-fp.name: MS120-8 FP
ms120-8-fp.description: Support a rich networking service in your home, with a compact access switch that helps you prioritize the traffic coming from data, voice, and video.
ms120-8-fp.tagline: Rich networking for your home office

features.longPhrase: Layer 2 access switching ideal for small branch deployments.
Easy management and configuration through an intuitive cloud interface.
Granular network visibility and detailed event logs to help you keep track of every configuration change in your network.

specs.text: Layer 2, 802.1X authentication
DHCP relay; DHCP snooping
STP enhancements; voice and video QoS
IPv4 and IPv6 ACLs

mv-smart-cameras.name: MV Smart Cameras
mv-smart-cameras.description: Monitor more than just security with Meraki cloud‑first smart cameras.

carouselItems.alt: The MV22 smart camera mounted to the ceiling via its white base. The black camera is visible inside its clear dome covering.
The MV22 smart camera mounted to the ceiling via its white base. The black camera is visible inside its clear dome covering.

features.longPhrase: Stay safe with smart, autonomous threat detection.
Monitor visitor traffic and set threshold alerts.
Plan your workplace allocation strategy with data.

mx67c.name: MX67C for SD-WAN
mx67c.description: A building block for SASE in a sleek desktop form factor with integrated LTE.

features.longPhrase: Next-generation layer 7 firewall and content filtering.
Extension of SD-WAN fabric to hybrid clouds and Cisco Umbrella.
At-a-glance performance of apps across the LAN, WAN, and app server with analytics powered by machine-learning.

specs.text: WAN: 2 GbE (one WAN/LAN use); one Cat 6 modem; one USB (cellular failover)
LAN: 4 GbE (one for WAN or LAN use)
450 Mbps firewall throughput
200 Mbps site-to-site VPN throughput
Supports up to 50 users

webex-board-pro-55.name: Webex Board Pro 55
webex-board-pro-55.description: The next-generation device for collaboration, content sharing, and whiteboarding in huddle spaces and small rooms.

carouselItems.alt: The Webex Board Pro 55. The screen shows the time of 9:54; the date August 9; and nine apps including Call, Whiteboard, Calendar, Webex, and Miro.

features.longPhrase: Experience the best of both worlds with high-quality video conferencing and powerful ideation tools.
Bring local and hybrid teams together to co-create with digital whiteboarding and content annotation.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings and access your favorite applications with the touch of a button.
Equip your rooms with AI-powered features including voice-enabled room controls and automated room capacity and cleaning alerts.

specs.text: Screen: 55-inch LCD touchscreen display
Resolution: 4k Ultra HD (3840x2160) (16:9)
Camera: Dual 4k, supports up to 60 fps
Field of view: Wide-lense camera offers 120° horizontal field of view while the main camera supports 85° horizontal field of view
Audio: 12-element beamforming microphone array and option for microphone extension
Speakers: Multi-channel loudspeaker system with high-quality full-range driver and separate force-cancelling woofers

webex-board-pro-75.name: Webex Board Pro 75
webex-board-pro-75.description: The next-generation device for video-first collaboration, content sharing, and whiteboarding in the ideation space.

carouselItems.alt: Animation of the Webex Board Pro 75, displaying the front and sides. The main screen shows six apps and the time of 9:54.
The front of the Webex Board Pro 75.
The back of the Webex Board Pro 75.
Three-quarters view of the Webex Board Pro 75.

features.longPhrase: Bring local and hybrid teams together to co-create with digital whiteboarding and content annotation.
Ideate before, during, and after the meeting with whiteboards that capture and save every idea so you can easily pick up where you left off.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings and access your favorite applications with the touch of a button.
Equip your spaces with AI-powered features, intelligent sensors, and voice-enabled room controls.

specs.text: Screen: 75-inch LCD touchscreen display
Resolution: 4k Ultra HD (3840x2160) (16:9)
Camera: Dual 4k, supports up to 60 fps
Field of view: Wide-lense camera offers 120° horizontal field of view while the main camera supports 85° horizontal field of view
Audio: 12-element beamforming microphone array and option for microphone extension
Speakers: Multi-channel loudspeaker system with high-quality full-range driver and separate force-cancelling woofers

description.homeOffice: The collaboration workstation designed for any desk in your home.
description.jumpRoom: The all-in-one collaboration device for every desk.

homeOffice.longPhrase: Do it all with a dedicated collaboration device that reduces fatigue and serves as a high-quality monitor.
Get up, move around, and stay energized with cameras that keep the focus on you.
Keep meetings distraction-free with virtual backgrounds and advanced noise removal.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings with the touch of a button.

jumpRoom.longPhrase: Do it all with a dedicated collaboration device that doubles as a high-quality monitor.
Pair your laptop to view and join upcoming meetings, share your screen, or focus on your work.
Interactive whiteboarding lets you brainstorm or ideate on the touch display, while virtual participants can contribute on any device.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings with just the touch of a button.

specs.text: Screen: 24-inch anti-glare LCD touchscreen display
Resolution: 1080p (16:9)
Camera: 8MP image sensors, supports up to 30 fps
Field of view: 64° horizontal field of view, 50° vertical field of view
Audio: 4-element microphone array
Speaker: Premium full-range center speaker with passive bass radiators

webex-desk-camera.name: Webex Desk Camera
webex-desk-camera.description: The webcam that powers video conferencing at the hot desk.

carouselItems.alt: Three-quarters view of the Webex Desk Camera.
Front view of the Webex Desk Camera.

features.longPhrase: Replace the low-angle, low-quality laptop view with a high-quality webcam.
Excellent video quality in all lighting conditions so you look great even when working late.
Background noise reduction so you can be clearly heard when the office is at its busiest.
Built-in privacy shutter so you always know when you're on and off camera.

specs.text: Screen: Attaches to a laptop or monitor with USB C-to-A and USB C-to-C cables
Resolution: Supports up to 1080p live video resolution
Camera: 4k Ultra HD, supports up to 60 fps
Field of view: 81° diagonal field of view
Audio: 2 omni-directional microphones

carouselItems.alt: The Webex Desk Hub shows a bright homescreen with five apps visible and a headset docked on the charging station.
Three-quarters back view of the Webex Desk Hub showing all its ports.
Back view of the Webex Desk Hub showing all its ports.
The Webex Desk Hub shows a bright homescreen with five apps visible and a headset docked on the charging station.

features.longPhrase: Walk up to any open space in the office and authenticate in seconds with wireless pairing.
Reserve your space for a specific time or the entire day.
See your full calendar and contact directory, join meetings, make calls, and charge your devices from one device.
Pair with the Webex Desk Camera for a full video conferencing solution at the hot desk.

specs.text: Screen: 6-inch touchscreen display
Resolution: 1920x1080
Camera: Pair with the Webex Desk Camera for a full video conferencing solution
Audio: Internal directional microphone

description.bedroom: The portable video conferencing device that's designed for taking meetings with you to any room.
description.kitchen: The portable video conferencing device that's designed for taking meetings with you to any room—even your kitchen.

features.longPhrase: Designed for portability, you can take it with you to any room in the house, including the kitchen, bedroom, or any small workspace.
Always appear professional with virtual backgrounds and noise removal.
Interactive whiteboarding lets you brainstorm or ideate on the touch display, while virtual participants can contribute from any device.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings with the touch of a button.

specs.text: Screen: 15.6-inch LCD touchscreen monitor
Resolutions: 1080p (16:9)
Camera: 8MP image sensors, supports up to 30fps
Field of view: 64° horizontal field of view, 50° vertical field of view
Audio: 3-element microphone system
Speakers: Single-channel loudspeaker system with a high quality 18mm tweeter and dual force-cancelling 80mm woofers

description.doctorsOffice: The most advanced all-in-one device for healthcare professionals.
description.lobby: The all-in-one device for virtual reception, visitor check-ins, and office navigation.

carouselItems.alt: The front of the Webex Desk Pro. The screen shows the time of 9:54 and the date August 9, plus icons to call, whiteboard, share, and join a Webex meeting.
The front of the Webex Desk Pro. The screen shows the time of 9:54 and the date August 9, plus icons to call, whiteboard, share, and join a Webex meeting.
The back of the Webex Desk Pro.

tagline.lobby: Greet employees in a new way.

doctorsOffice.longPhrase: Meet with patients, share content, and annotate on documents with a single, intelligent device.
Eliminate distractions with virtual backgrounds and background noise removal.
Custom web apps allows for quick access to commonly used healthcare applications.
Wipeable metal grille option for sanitization.

lobby.longPhrase: Display safety guidelines, building occupancy, and environmental health with digital signage.
Provide intuitive office navigation with wayfinding.
Begin health assessments with web applications and connect visitors with a virtual receptionist.
Enable a zero-touch experience with voice-activated commands.

specs.text: Screen: 27-inch LCD touchscreen display
Resolutions: 4k (3840x2160) (16:9)
Camera: 4k, supports up to 30 fps
Field of view: 71° horizontal field of view, 59° vertical field of view
Audio: 8-element microphone array
Speakers: 3 directional speakers and a subwoofer

webex-room-bar.name: Webex Room Bar
webex-room-bar.description: The intelligent video collaboration bar that attaches to single or dual displays.
webex-room-bar.tagline: Get a boardroom experience at home.

features.longPhrase: Combines codec, camera, microphones, and speakers into a single device that integrates with a 4K display.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings with the touch of a button.
Intelligent views let you move around your home office during a meeting while staying in the frame and AI-noise removal keeps unwanted sounds out of your meeting.
Control your meeting from a distance with the Webex Room Navigator or use Webex Assistant for a zero-touch experience.

specs.text: Screen: Attaches to up to two 4K displays via HDMI
Resolution: Supports up to 1080p live video resolution
Camera: 4k Ultra HD, supports up to 60 fps
Field of view: 120° horizontal field of view
Audio: 4-element, beamforming microphone array, with external microphone input option
Speakers: Dual stereo loudspeakers for spatial sound

webex-room-kit-mini.name: Webex Room Kit Mini
webex-room-kit-mini.description: The intelligent video collaboration bar that attaches to any 4K display in your home.

features.longPhrase: Combines codec, camera, microphones, and speakers into a single device that integrates with a 4K display.
Easily join Webex, Zoom, Microsoft, or Google meetings with just the touch of a button.
Intelligent views allows you to move around your home office while in a meeting and AI-noise removal keeps unwanted sounds out of your meeting.
Control your meeting experience from a distance with the Webex Room Navigator or use Webex Assistant for a zero-touch experience.

specs.text: Screen: Attaches to 4k displays via HDMI
Resolution: Supports up to 1080p live video resolution
Camera: 4k Ultra HD, supports up to 60 fps
Field of view: 120° horizontal field of view
Audio: 4-element microphone array
Speakers: Full range speaker and two woofers

webex-room-kit-pro.name: Webex Room Kit Pro
webex-room-kit-pro.description: The ultimate video collaboration kit for large rooms with multi-screen support and robust integrations.

carouselItems.alt: Webex Room Kit Pro. Gray quad camera above Codec Pro in white with the Cisco logo visible on the front edge of the Codec Pro.

features.longPhrase: State-of-the-art video conferencing and 4K content sharing.
Support up to three screens and dual content sources.
Take advantage of flexible pan-tilt-zoom cameras for custom deployments and presenter tracking.
Equip your large rooms with AI-powered features including voice-enabled room controls and automated room capacity and cleaning alerts.

specs.text: Camera: UltraHD, 5x digital zoom, 83-degree field of view, auto-framing
Field of view: 83° horizontal field of view; 51.5° vertical field of view
Audio: 8 microphones, 48V phantom powered, Euroblock connector, each with separate echo cancellers and noise reduction.
Speaker: 6-element high-performing microphone array for accurate speaker tracking and immersive audio.
Codec Pro: One of the most powerful and feature-rich collaboration engines available with ultimate video and audio quality
Room controls: Room Navigator for intuitive conference controls, room controls, room booking and third-party workplace applications

description.boardroom: The intuitive touch panel equipped with built-in sensors and powerful APIs.
description.homeOffice: The intuitive touch panel equipped with built-in sensors and powerful APIs.
description.jumpRoom: The wall panel display that makes office navigation a breeze.
description.noc: The intuitive touch panel equipped with built-in sensors and powerful APIs.

tagline.boardroom: Control every aspect of your meeting
tagline.homeOffice: Control every aspect of your meeting
tagline.noc: Control every aspect of your meeting
tagline.smallConferenceRoom: Control every aspect of your meeting

boardroom.longPhrase: Touchscreen or hands-free control of room reservation, temperature, lighting, and the meeting itself.
View and access upcoming meetings, contact lists, and directories.
Stay informed on room humidity, air quality, temperature, and noise level with intelligent sensors that help maintain a safe workspace.
Display custom content, such as stock price and industry news, on the display when in standby mode.

homeOffice.longPhrase: Touchscreen or hands-free control of room reservation, temperature, lighting, and the meeting itself.
View and access upcoming meetings, contact lists, and directories.
Stay informed on room humidity, air quality, temperature, and noise level with intelligent sensors that help maintain a safe workspace.
Display custom content, such as stock price and industry news, on the display when in standby mode.

jumpRoom.longPhrase: Quickly identify available rooms from a distance with 360° LED indicators.
You'll never have to wonder if you're in the right place with the name of the meeting and reserved time displayed on the device.
Display custom content for internal communications, wayfinding, and branding purposes.
Leverage the native Webex experience or switch to your preferred workspace applications.

noc.longPhrase: Touchscreen or hands-free control of room reservation, temperature, lighting, and the meeting itself.
View and access upcoming meetings, contact lists, and directories.
Stay informed on room humidity, air quality, temperature, and noise level with intelligent sensors that help maintain a safe workspace.
Display custom content, such as stock price and industry news, on the display when in standby mode.

View and access upcoming meetings, contact lists, and directories.
Stay informed on room humidity, air quality, temperature, and noise level with intelligent sensors that help maintain a safe workspace.
Display custom content, such as stock price and industry news, on the display when in standby mode.

specs.text: Screen: 10.1-inch LCD touchscreen
Resolution: 1920x1200

webex-room-panorama.name: Webex Room Panorama
webex-room-panorama.description: The multi-screen, integrated room system designed for the modern C-Suite.

carouselItems.alt: Webex Room Panorama. 1 screen on top and 2 on bottom. Bottom left screen shows room name and 3 apps (Call, Share, Meetings).

carouselItems.filename: Cisco Project Workplace - Executive Meeting (Nixie) _ Panorama _ Hero.jpg

webex-room-panorama.tagline: Bring immersive video to the boardroom.

features.longPhrase: State-of-the-art video conferencing and stunning presentations displayed on the dedicated content screen.
Leverage camera intelligence and a wide panoramic view of the room---just as if everyone were in the same space.
Benefit from spatial audio in the room as remote participants enjoy directional sound.
Equip your boardroom with intelligent room controls and AI-powered features for the ultimate experience.

specs.text: Screens: Two Samsung 82-inch 8K displays for video and one Samsung 65-inch 4K display for content
Resolution: Full HD with up to 1080p60 for live video and 4Kp15 for content
Cameras: Four 5K cameras and automatic framing for the full panoramic view
Field of view: 83° horizontal field of view, 51.5° vertical field of view
Audio: Intelligent table microphone array for directional audio pickup
Speakers: Full duplex, high-quality stereo sound

wi-fi-phones.name: Wi-Fi Phones
wi-fi-phones.description: The Wi-Fi phone designed for frontline workers and healthcare professionals.

carouselItems.alt: 2 Webex Wireless Phones in black, the 840 and the 860. The screens display content such as date, time, and apps like Chrome

features.longPhrase: Ruggedized design withstands drops with a durable glass multi-touch screen.
Long battery life and swappable battery so you never run out of power.
Optional scanner for retail, medical, and manufacturing environments.
Android operating system 10 enables administrators to control applications.

specs.text: Connectivity: Bluetooth® 4.2 (Webex Wireless Phone 840 model) and Bluetooth® 5.0 LE (Webex Wireless Phone 860), USB-C, 3.5 mm audio
Water, chemical, and dust resistance though IP68 (860 model) and IP65 (840 model)
Hot-swappable 3000 mAh battery eliminating downtime between shifts using the 860. Swappable 3040 mAh battery on the 840
Equipped with accelerometer, gyroscope, magnetometer (compass), and ALS/proximity sensors
Durable glass multi-touch screen with either Dragontail™ or Gorilla™ technology
Both models survive multiple 1.8-meter drops onto a steel plate
